attributes.additional_details: This petition is to call for better pay for care home staff, service users pay around £500 per week to live in a care home yet staff are still only being paid £6.31 per hour as most will agree it is a very difficult job and most of the time understaffed and I would like to see staff being better paid

rejection.details: Please read the terms and conditions of creating an e-petition.  You need to provide your full name and your email address.  Please resubmit your petition providing your full name.
